Education.institution: Nirmala Memorial Foundation College of Commerce and Science

Projects.name: HR-Automation
Projects.description: A professional summary in a resume is a concise paragraph, typically placed at the top of the document, that summarizes your key skills, experience, and achievements. It acts as a quick overview of your career profile and helps hiring managers understand your qualifications and how they align with the job requirement
Projects.technologies: NextJs, RactJs, Tailwind Css, NeonDB, Prisma
